title: VA_-_Hardcore_Killers_-_The_Second_Horror_File_2CD_2011 [hardcor
description:
*********************************************************************************
                      Hardcore Killers - The Second Horror File 
*********************************************************************************         

         _________________________[ Release Info ]________________________
 

            Artist          :: VA
            Title           :: Hardcore Killers - The Second Horror File
            Company         :: Globe
            Catalognr       :: 898036-2
            Genre           :: Hardcore
            Year            :: 2011
            Url             :: http://www.discogs.com/release/2803801

            Grabber         :: EAC
            Encoder         :: LAME
            Source          :: CDDA
            Quality         :: 320kbps / 44.1kHz / Joint-Stereo
            Playtime        :: 156:02 min
            Size            :: 360 MB

            Released        :: 26-04-2011


        _________________________[ Release Notes ]________________________


          From Germany comes once again a very nice compilation CD. Perfect 
          if you do not have a CD yet of the ''current'' mainstream hardcore.
          Shame that some tracks are on the other compilation as well

          Ow, too bad the Germans have a hard time with artist names and 
          track titles. I hope I sort things out for the most part.

         _________________________[ Tracklist ]____________________________
